data.message: Greatest time ever. :) When my pages get more likes, I got a question. This is my last/final time to be blocked. I got a question too: How do I be respectful with a good behavior without getting blocked? Any Ideas how to be safe too?

replies.message: Hi Andrew. The best way to prevent yourself from being blocked is to make sure you're following our Community Standards. You can view these here: http://bit.ly/2wl44lR. Thanks! -Caitlin
You're welcome Caitlin. :) I'm sure my pages are being nice to people... uh, I'm having a great day.
